textBox.richText: President’s Day Weekend...for the second year in a row, we decide to hit Alta rather than the crowds at WP. Stayed up at the Goldminer’s Daughter, a lodge at the Wildcat base, right at the Wildcat and Collins lifts. Pretty cool...they did breakfast and dinner, and had a nifty “wrecking room” (rec room?) that Max dug, with Ping Pong and Pool. Not as much snow as last year, but still skied the full 3 days. Here’s the vid:
